inns.title: Inn at Fall Creek Falls
inns.inn_description:
The Inn at Fall Creek Falls, which included the conference center and restaurant, is closed for rebuild.

We are preparing for demolition and the construction of a brand new 95,700+ square foot inn, restaurant and conference center at Fall Creek Falls State Park. If you scroll to the bottom of this page you can view some of the proposed design renderings. Construction began in 2018 and is expected to be a multi-year project.

Cabins Still Available for Rent

Even though the inn and restaurant are closed, the park still operates beautiful cabins and an expansive inventory of campsites. Several of the cabins sit right on the shores of the tranquil Fall Creek Lake.

Food Options Available at the Park

If you&'re looking for food during your visit, the golf course snack bar and village green snack bar are both available nearby and great options for park visitors.

We appreciate your patience and hope that you will still come and stay at Fall Creek Falls State Park. It is one of Tennessee's most popular parks. Fall Creek Falls State Park encompasses more than 26,000 acres sprawled across the eastern top of the rugged Cumberland Plateau. The park's namesake is one of the highest waterfalls in the eastern United States. Laced with cascades, gorges, waterfalls, streams and lush stands of virgin hardwood timber, Fall Creek Falls beckons those who enjoy nature at her finest.

inns.title: Inn at Henry Horton
inns.inn_description:
Henry Horton State Park, located in Chapel Hill, attracts vacationing families from across Tennessee and the Southeast. The park is home to a 68-room inn, diverse amenities and renowned riverside picnic sites. An Olympic-sized pool is open seasonally.

A few rooms are fully handicap accessible. Ask about an upgrade to a suite outfitted with a kitchenette and living area. A continental breakfast will be provided to inn guests in the hotel lobby Monday through Friday.

The Inn's Conference Center has four meeting rooms with 2,000 sq. ft of space to accommodate 15-90 person groups. The Conference Lodge with 3,150 sq. ft of meeting space is located in a separate building near the inn and is used for large meetings up to 300 people.

Please note: Guests are not allowed to use personal grills on patios, balconies or around the Inn and Conference Center. For your convenience, grills and picnic tables are provided throughout the park.

For more information, call 931-364-2222.

inns.title: Inn at Montgomery Bell
inns.inn_description:
The Lodge Montgomery Bell features 117 rooms and sits on the banks of Lake Acorn at Montgomery Bell State Park in Burns, TN. Located just 40 minutes outside Nashville, this fully remodeled hotel features modern rooms, a new full-service restaurant, and 6,000 square feet of conference space. The Lodge is the perfect place to disconnect from the hustle and bustle of the city—enjoy lounging by the outdoor pool or kick back with a craft beer in the lounge. For the more adventuresome, the park has kayaks for rent on Lake Acorn, miles hiking trail and miles of mountain bike trail, in addition to an 18-hole golf course.

Weddings, Conferences, and Other Events

We know events can be stressful. Let our knowledgeable group sales staff lessen your burden. In addition to hotel rooms, we offer full-service catering and can help create a memorable event. Our group sales staff are now booking conferences, weddings, and meetings. Browse our Catering and Event Guide or Reach out today to learn about planning your event at Montgomery Bell State Park.

Click here for FAQs about the Lodge at Montgomery Bell renovation and constructio

inns.title: Inn at Natchez Trace
inns.inn_description:
The Pin Oak Lodge is situated on scenic Pin Oak Lake and has 47 guestrooms. Half of the rooms face Pin Oak Lake and the other half face the outdoor pool. A few rooms are fully handicap accessible. Ask about an upgrade to a hotel suite.

Wifi is now available through out the Pin Oak Lodge, including all guest rooms, lobby, restaurant, and conference center!

Many of our guestrooms are in the process of being remodeled. Please excuse our dust - we look forward to providing you a new, improved experience!

Please note: Guests are not allowed to use personal grills on patios, balconies or around the Inn and Conference Center. For your convenience, grills and picnic tables are provided throughout the park.

inns.title: Inn at Paris Landing
inns.inn_description:
The Inn at Paris Landing, which included The Riverboat Restaurant, is closed for rebuild.

The closure of this facility is in preparation for the construction of a brand-new inn and restaurant on the premises. We do have a few important things you should know as you prepare your visit:

A New Restaurant opened August 2018

We are pleased to announce the opening of Marker 66 Marina & Grille at Paris Landing. This restaurant, located at the park's marina, serves lunch and dinner. You can find more information on this website and the restaurant's Facebook page.

Cabins & Campsites Still Available for Rent

Even though the Inn at Paris Landing is closed, the park still offers cabin rentals and campsites. Stay right on the water and enjoy a weekend at the park.

We appreciate your patience as we make these improvements to the park. We want Paris Landing to be a premier destination for Tennessee vacations and this is a key step toward reaching that goal. We hope you will still make plans to visit Paris Landing State Park and enjoy some time on Kentucky Lake - golfing, boating, fishing, and sightseeing.

inns.title: Inn at Pickwick Landing
inns.inn_disclaimer: Taxes and fees are not included. Rates subject to change.
inns.inn_description:
COMING 2020

The 119-room Lodge overlooks the Tennessee River just south of Pickwick Dam. Guests will enjoy the 18-hole golf course at Pickwick Landing State park along with many options for boating, fishing and other water sports. The fully-remodeled Lodge, opening in Summer 2020, will include modern room designs and a new full-service restaurant, bar and lounge overlooking the water. Renovated conference center and meeting spaces make the Lodge an ideal destination for individuals and groups.

The Lodge at Pickwick Landing is located east of Memphis just North of where the Alabama and Mississippi state lines meet. This is a perfect lakeside vacation spot for anyone travelling from Memphis, TN; Tupelo, MS; Huntsville, AL; or Jackson, TN.

Click here for FAQs about the The Lodge at Pickwick Landing renovation and construction.

PERFECT FOR GROUPS AND WEDDINGS

With a beautiful, natural backdrop and full-service facilities, The Lodge at Pickwick Landing will be one of the premiere event venues for conferences, weddings and groups in the Memphis, North Mississippi and Huntsville areas. The on-site lodging, dining, and catering options allow groups to enjoy the outdoors without sacrificing the convenience of venue rentals in metropolitan areas.

Let us know you are interested using this form and a member of our group sales staff will gladly reach out to you.
